short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Little extension that allows users to quickly add content to Sivit's UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sivit is a platform for curated content. This extension allows a user to quickly add content to their Sivit Profile without having to leave the page that they are currently browsing.
